Description:Application-consistent Recovery Point failed. Description:Application-consistent Recovery Point failed. Causes:Failed to quiesce the VM. Resolution:Review the logs in the guest VM and take neccessary actions. If issue persists contact Nutanix Support. Nutanix KB:

trigger.expression: {Template Nutanix SNMP:snmptrap["VSS is enabled but VSS software or pre_freeze/post_thaw scripts are not ins"].iregexp("VSS is enabled but VSS software or pre_freeze/post_thaw scripts are not ins")}=1
trigger.name: VSS Scripts Not Installed
trigger.description: Category Type: SystemIndicator DR Affected Entity Type:protection_domain Subcategory Type:Data Protection-Protection Domain Scope:kCluster Title:VSS Software or (pre_freeze/post_thaw) Scripts Not Installed Name:VSS Scripts Not Installed Message:VSS is enabled but VSS software or pre_freeze/post_thaw scripts are not installed on the guest VM(s) {vm_names} protected by {protection_domain_name}. Description:VSS software or pre_freeze/post_thaw scripts are not installed Description:VSS software or pre_freeze/post_thaw scripts are not installed Causes:VSS is enabled but VSS software or pre_freeze/post_thaw scripts are not installed on the VM(s). Resolution:Install VSS software or (pre_freeze/post_thaw) scripts on the guest VM(s). Nutanix KB:

trigger.expression: {Template Nutanix SNMP:snmptrap["VSS is enabled, but Nutanix VSS provider or pre_freeze/post_thaw scripts ar"].iregexp("VSS is enabled, but Nutanix VSS provider or pre_freeze/post_thaw scripts ar")}=1
trigger.name: VSS Scripts Not Installed On VM
trigger.description: Category Type: SystemIndicator DR Affected Entity Type:vm Subcategory Type:Data Protection-Virtual Machine Scope:kCluster Title:Nutanix VSS provider or (pre_freeze/post_thaw) Scripts Not Installed. Name:VSS Scripts Not Installed On VM Message:VSS is enabled, but Nutanix VSS provider or pre_freeze/post_thaw scripts are not installed on the VM {vm_name}. Description:Nutanix VSS provider or pre_freeze/post_thaw Scripts Not Installed. Description:Nutanix VSS provider or pre_freeze/post_thaw Scripts Not Installed. Causes:VSS is enabled, but Nutanix VSS provider or pre_freeze/post_thaw scripts are not installed on the VM. Resolution:Install Nutanix VSS provider or (pre_freeze/post_thaw) scripts on the VM. Nutanix KB:

trigger.expression: {Template Nutanix SNMP:snmptrap["VSS snapshot is not supported for the following VMs protected by Protection"].iregexp("VSS snapshot is not supported for the following VMs protected by Protection")}=1
trigger.name: VSS Snapshot Not Supported
trigger.description: Category Type: DR SystemIndicator Affected Entity Type:protection_domain Subcategory Type:Data Protection-Protection Domain Scope:kCluster Title:VSS Snapshot is not supported for some VMs. Name:VSS Snapshot Not Supported Message:VSS snapshot is not supported for the following VMs protected by Protection Domain '{protection_domain_name}'. VMs list: '{vm_names}' Description:VSS snapshot is not supported for some VMs. Description:VSS snapshot is not supported for some VMs. Causes:Some VMs in the Protected Domain have unsupported configuration. Resolution:For more details, please review the alerts generated at VM page and fix the unsupported configuration. Nutanix KB:

trigger.expression: {Template Nutanix SNMP:snmptrap["VSS snapshot failed for the VM(s) [\S]* protected by the {protection_d"].iregexp("VSS snapshot failed for the VM(s) [\S]* protected by the {protection_d")}=1
trigger.name: VSS Snapshot Status
trigger.description: Category Type: SystemIndicator DR Affected Entity Type:protection_domain Subcategory Type:Data Protection-Protection Domain Scope:kCluster Title:VSS Snapshot Failed Name:VSS Snapshot Status Message:VSS snapshot failed for the VM(s) {vm_names} protected by the {protection_domain_name} in the snapshot {snapshot_id} because {reason}. Description:VSS snapshot failed. Description:VSS snapshot failed. Causes:Guest is not able to quiesce VM due to internal error. Resolution:Review the logs in the guest VM and take necessary actions. If issue persists contact Nutanix Support. Nutanix KB:

trigger.expression: {Template Nutanix SNMP:snmptrap["VM(s) [\S]* Guest Agent Service is not reachable, protected by {protec"].iregexp("VM(s) [\S]* Guest Agent Service is not reachable, protected by {protec")}=1
trigger.name: VSS VM Reachable
trigger.description: Category Type: SystemIndicator DR Affected Entity Type:protection_domain Subcategory Type:Data Protection-Protection Domain Scope:kCluster Title:Nutanix Guest Tools Agent Is Not Reachable On The VM Name:VSS VM Reachable Message:VM(s) {vm_names} Guest Agent Service is not reachable, protected by {protection_domain_name}. Description:VSS on VM(s) is not reachable. Description:VSS on VM(s) is not reachable. Causes:The communication link to the VMs Nutanix Guest Agent service seems to be down. Resolution:Please check and restart Nutanix Guest Agent service inside the VM. Nutanix KB:

trigger.expression: {Template Nutanix SNMP:snmptrap["Snapshot status for vstore [\S]*: [\S]*."].iregexp("Snapshot status for vstore [\S]*: [\S]*.")}=1
trigger.name: VStore Snapshot Status
trigger.description: Category Type: SystemIndicator DR Storage Affected Entity Type:cluster Subcategory Type:Data Protection-Protection Domain Scope:kCluster Title:VStore Snapshot Status Name:VStore Snapshot Status Message:Snapshot status for vstore {vstore_name}: {reason}. Description:vStore snapshot status. Description:vStore snapshot status. Causes:Various Resolution:Resolve the stated reason for the failure. If you cannot resolve the error, contact Nutanix support. Nutanix KB:

trigger.expression: {Template Nutanix SNMP:snmptrap["Failed to [\S]* since [\S]* for the protection domain '"].iregexp("Failed to [\S]* since [\S]* for the protection domain '")}=1
trigger.name: Witness Not Reachable
trigger.description: Category Type: SystemIndicator DR Affected Entity Type:protection_domain Subcategory Type:Data Protection-Witness Scope:kCluster Title:Witness is not reachable Name:Witness Not Reachable Message:Failed to {operation} since {unreachable_since} for the protection domain '{protection_domain_name}' to the remote site '{remote_name}'. Reason: Witness is not reachable or the Witness credentials are incorrect Description:Witness is not reachable Description:Witness is not reachable Causes:Witness or the network is down. Witness credentials are incorrect. Resolution:Check if Witness is up on the network. Check Witness credentials. Nutanix KB:http://portal.nutanix.com/kb/5483

trigger.expression: {Template Nutanix SNMP:snmptrap["The node cannot issue witness APIs to witness: [\S]*"].iregexp("The node cannot issue witness APIs to witness: [\S]*")}=1
trigger.name: Witness VM is unreachable from a node in two node cluster
trigger.description: Category Type: SystemIndicator Cluster Affected Entity Type:host Subcategory Type:CVM-Services Scope:kNode Title:Witness is unreachable from node. Name:Witness VM is unreachable from a node in two node cluster Message:The node cannot issue witness APIs to witness: {message} Description:Unable to reach the Witness VM over the network, the cluster may not be able to handle a node failure. Description:Unable to reach the Witness VM over the network, the cluster may not be able to handle a node failure. Causes:Node is unable to issue APIs to witness VM. Resolution:Check the witness VM to verify it is up and verify the cluster nodes can communication with the Witness VM over the network. Nutanix KB:

trigger.expression: {Template Nutanix SNMP:snmptrap["Zookeeper is not active on all CVMs."].iregexp("Zookeeper is not active on all CVMs.")}=1
trigger.name: Zookeeper active on all CVMs
trigger.description: Category Type: SystemIndicator Cluster Affected Entity Type:cluster Subcategory Type:Cluster-Services Scope:kCluster Title:Zookeeper Not Active on All CVMs Name:Zookeeper active on all CVMs Message:Zookeeper is not active on all CVMs. Description:Checks if number of active zookeepers is equal to the total number of zookeeper CVMs Description:Checks if number of active zookeepers is equal to the total number of zookeeper CVMs Causes:Zookeeper service is not running on all CVMs. Resolution:Contact Nutanix support. Nutanix KB:http://portal.nutanix.com/kb/1587

trigger.expression: {Template Nutanix SNMP:snmptrap["Zookeeper alias is incorrectly configured in the cluster."].iregexp("Zookeeper alias is incorrectly configured in the cluster.")}=1
trigger.name: Zookeeper Alias Check
trigger.description: Category Type: SystemIndicator Cluster Affected Entity Type:host Subcategory Type:Node-Services Scope:kNode Title:Zookeeper alias is incorrectly configured in the cluster. Name:Zookeeper Alias Check Message:{msg} Description:Check Zookeeper alias information configuration Description:Check Zookeeper alias information configuration Causes:ZK aliases in one or more sources do not match with the Zookeeper server config maintained by Zookeeper. Resolution:Ensure the ZK aliases are consistent across all locations. Nutanix KB:http://portal.nutanix.com/kb/1700

trigger.expression: {Template Nutanix SNMP:snmptrap["Zookeeper server on the Controller VM ID [\S]* is unresponsive si"].iregexp("Zookeeper server on the Controller VM ID [\S]* is unresponsive si")}=1
trigger.name: Zookeeper server unresponsive for a long time
trigger.description: Category Type: SystemIndicator Cluster Affected Entity Type:cluster Subcategory Type:CVM-Services Scope:kCluster Title:Zookeeper server unresponsive. Name:Zookeeper server unresponsive for a long time Message:Zookeeper server on the Controller VM ID {service_vm_id} is unresponsive since {death_timestamp_secs}. Description:Zookeeper server might be unresponsive on a CVM for a long time. Description:Zookeeper server might be unresponsive on a CVM for a long time. Causes:Zookeeper server on one of the nodes has been unresponsive for a long time. Resolution:Follow KB1587 to troubleshoot reasons for Zookeeper server being unresponsive. Nutanix KB:http://portal.nutanix.com/kb/1587
